sentence: yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubb'upagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya yassa sambādho bhavissati, so pakkamissatī'ti etad'eva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.

meaning: offence requiring confession, offence involving expiation

sentence: yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubb'upagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappeyya yassa sambādho bhavissati, so pakkamissatī'ti etad'eva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
pali_1: If any monk, encroaching upon a previously arrived monk, should knowingly make a sleeping place in a dwelling belonging to the community [thinking]: "For whom it is cramped, he will leave,'' having done [it] only for this reason, not another; there is an offence requiring confession.
